Simple and easy budgeting

Set monthly spending targets and stay on track.


Visualized Feedback

View your monthly spending at a glance and always know if you're under or over your budget.


Quick Totals

Rolled up totals show you exactly how much you've earned and spent in each category.



Spending Limits

Categorize your monthly expenses and create a simple budget with managable spending limits.

Real-time Feedback

Know the impact your purchases make on your budget the moment you make them.

Customizable

Create custom expense categories to tailor the software for your exact needs.


Your budget wherever you are.




Mobile Friendly Design

Cashbook Budgeting works on all of your devices. From smart phones and tablets to desktops. No matter where you, your budget is always accessible.

Automatically Categorize Transactions

Our smart budgeting software learns how to categorize your transactions over time, so you don't have to spend time logging them manually.

Review Transactions by Category

View your individual transaction history or look at the bigger picture. Our software lets you do both so you can see as little or as much detail as you need.

Import Transactions

If you have accounts at other financial institutions and wish to track expenses from them, easily import them using the industry standard OFX file format.

About Pennyminder

We believe credit unions are the most sustainable, responsible way to bank, and we're dedicated to helping you succeed by providing tools and solutions to empower your members to manage their finances more easily and to make better choices about their finances. We're located in Mission British Columbia in the heart of the Fraser Valley
